Package it.polimi.ingsw.utils

Class Position

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.utils.Position
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<Position>
public class Position extends Object implements Comparable<Position>, Serializable
Class representing a pair of coordinates in a 2D space.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    int
    compareTo(Position other)
    Compares the this to another Position: this less than other iff the row of this is smaller than the row of other or, in case of equality between the rows, if the column of this is smaller than the column of other.
    boolean

    Two Positions are equal if they share the same row and column.

  • Constructor Details

    • Position

      public Position(int row, int column)
      Constructor for the class. It sets the row and the column.
      Parameters:
      row - The row (y-coordinate) of the position.
      column - The column (x-coordinate) of the position.

    • Position

      public Position()
      No-args constructor, used for JSON. It creates an invalid position: (-1, -1).

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(Position other)
      Compares the this to another Position: this less than other iff the row of this is smaller than the row of other or, in case of equality between the rows, if the column of this is smaller than the column of other.
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<Position>
      Parameters:
      other - The object to compare this with.
      Returns:
      int less than 0 if this less than other, int equal to 0 if this equal to other, else an int bigger than 0.
